img_above_text:
![Wukong Thunderclap 52.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/11/Wukong_Thunderclap_52.jpg)
Once you've learned the timing of his combo, you can also perform a Rock Solid Deflection on his second strike even when he's incorporeal, and the deflection will knock him backward and out of his transparent form, allowing you to press your attack.
img_below_text:
If you take too long to recover and try to rush him, he's likely to fade away and warp backward while immune to damage, so only expend your focus points if you're catching him at the right time.
![Wukong Thunderclap 50.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/6c/Wukong_Thunderclap_50.jpg)
summary_promot:

Once you've learned the timing of his combo, you can also perform a Rock Solid Deflection on his second strike even when he's incorporeal, and the deflection will knock him backward and out of his transparent form, allowing you to press your attack."
        - Following Text: "If you take too long to recover and try to rush him, he's likely to fade away and warp backward while immune to damage, so only expend your focus points if you're catching him at the right time.
![Wukong Thunderclap 50.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/6c/Wukong_Thunderclap_50.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a combat scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showcasing the player character facing an incorporeal enemy in a dimly lit environment. The glowing golden trail suggests an active ability or attack being used, while the "Non-Void" health bar indicates the enemy's status. The preceding and following text explain strategies for timing deflections and attacking the enemy when it exits its transparent form, emphasizing precision and focus during the encounter.
